text: "Bad Apple!!" is the sixth song in the soundtrack of the 1998 video game Lotus Land Story, part of the Touhou Project series made by Team Shanghai Alice. The song was created to play during the third stage of the game as a chiptune on the Japanese NEC PC-9800 computer. It was composed at 161 beats per minute using a frequency modulation chip. A remake of the song, featured in an official Touhou album called Akyu's Untouched Score Volume 1, was released on May 21, 2006. This version has gained over 1.4 million views on YouTube. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1998 songs Category:Electronic music Category:Video game memes Category:Video games
title: Bad Apple!!
